name: tm74
effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.platinum: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
